property_management.title: Property Management
property_management.description: Professional and efficient management for communities and property owners.
property_management.text: We take care of everything so your community runs smoothly and worry-free. Transparency, efficiency, and commitment in every service.

vacation_rentals.title: Vacation Rentals
vacation_rentals.description: Turn your property into a profitable rental without the hassle.
vacation_rentals.text: We maximize your property's profitability with a full-service, worry-free approach.
phrases: Let your property generate income for you.
We handle everything so you can enjoy the benefits.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: We are here to help. Let's talk!
contact.text: Our team is ready to offer tailored solutions and expert advice.
phrases: We answer your questions with professionalism.
Your peace of mind is our mission.

index.title: GestoFinca
index.description: Experts in property management and vacation rentals.
index.text: More than just management, a complete solution for owners and communities.
phrases: Your peace of mind, our commitment.

about_us.title: About Us
about_us.description: Commitment, professionalism, and transparency in managing your property.
about_us.text: Specialists in property management and vacation rentals, offering a close and efficient service.
phrases: Experience and trust at your service.
Over 10 years of successfully managing properties.
Excellence and commitment in every service.

quotes.title: Quotes
quotes.description: Request your free quote with no obligation.
quotes.text: We tailor our services to your needs with full transparency and competitive pricing.

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.description: We protect your information with the highest commitment.
privacy_policy.text: Check our policy to learn how we handle and protect your data.
phrases: We comply with all current regulations.

forms.title: Forms
forms.description: We make your transactions easy with quick and simple forms.

privacy_policy.label: I have read and accept the privacy policy

phrases: Your request is just one click away.

footer.phrase: Your peace of mind is our mission.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: Principles that guide our work and define us as a company.

value1.title: Commitment
value1.description: Your peace of mind is our priority. We ensure top-quality service.

value2.title: Transparency
value2.description: We build relationships based on trust, with clear and honest management.

value3.title: Professionalism
value3.description: A team of experts at your service to guarantee efficient and hassle-free management.

service1.title: Property Management
